mapper.select: SELECT fg.file_regdate ,fd.file_sn , fd.file_group_no , fd.file_original_name , fd.file_save_name , fd.file_save_locate , fd.file_size , fd.file_ext , fd.file_mime , fd.file_fancysize , fd.file_save_date , fd.file_downcount FROM file_group fg LEFT OUTER JOIN file_detail fd ON fg.file_group_no = fd.file_group_no WHERE fg.file_group_no=#{fileGroupNo}

/* com.ohot.home.inquiry.mapper.InquiryPostMapper.getInquiryDetail */ SELECT level , ( SELECT bbs_nm FROM board_type WHERE bbs_type_cd_no = 4 ) AS bbs_nm , bp.bbs_post_no , CASE WHEN level = 1 then bp.bbs_title ELSE rpad('‚îÇ ', (level - 2) * 4, '‚îÇ ') || '‚îî ' || bp.bbs_title END AS bbs_title , bp.bbs_cn , bp.bbs_chg_dt , bp.bbs_html_cn , fg.file_group_no , fd.file_save_locate , bp.parent_post_no , m.mem_no , NVL(ip.inq_writer, 'Í¥ÄÎ¶¨Ïûê') AS inq_writer , CASE WHEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) = TRUNC(bp.bbs_reg_dt) THEN TO_CHAR(bp.bbs_reg_dt, 'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(bp.bbs_reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') END AS display_date , bbs_reg_dt , m.mem_email , ( SELECT inq_type_nm FROM inquiry_type it WHERE ip.inq_type_no = it.inq_type_no ) AS inq_type_nm , CASE ip.ans_yn WHEN 'Y' then 'ÎãµÎ≥Ä ÏôÑÎ£å' WHEN 'N' then 'ÎØ∏ÎãµÎ≥Ä' ELSE '‚Äî' END AS ans_yn , ip.inq_pswd FROM board_post bp LEFT OUTER JOIN inquiry_post ip ON bp.bbs_post_no = ip.bbs_post_no LEFT OUTER JOIN member m ON ip.mem_no = m.mem_no LEFT OUTER JOIN file_group fg ON bp.file_group_no = fg.file_group_no LEFT OUTER JOIN file_detail fd ON fg.file_group_no = fd.file_group_no WHERE bp.bbs_type_cd_no = 4 /* AND bp.bbs_del_yn = 'N' */ AND bp.bbs_post_no=#{boardNo} START WITH bp.parent_post_no IS null CONNECT BY PRIOR bp.bbs_post_no = bp.parent_post_no

/* com.ohot.home.inquiry.mapper.InquiryPostMapper.getReplyPost */ SELECT bp.bbs_post_no , bp.bbs_title , bp.bbs_cn , fg.file_group_no , fd.file_save_locate , bp.parent_post_no , CASE WHEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) = TRUNC(bp.bbs_reg_dt) THEN TO_CHAR(bp.bbs_reg_dt, 'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(bp.bbs_reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END AS display_date , bbs_reg_dt , ip.inq_pswd FROM board_post bp LEFT OUTER JOIN inquiry_post ip ON bp.bbs_post_no = ip.bbs_post_no LEFT OUTER JOIN file_group fg ON bp.file_group_no = fg.file_group_no LEFT OUTER JOIN file_detail fd ON fg.file_group_no = fd.file_group_no WHERE bp.bbs_type_cd_no = 4 AND bp.bbs_del_yn = 'N' AND bp.parent_post_no=#{boardNo}
